headline: GTA Online Update
subtitle: Introducing the Invetero Coquette Classic
content:
If work is flying a fighter jet, your weekend ride better be pretty special to compete. The radical lines of the Coquette Classic will make you regret even the slightest crash. But don’t worry, the big engine and bad handling will ensure you’re too dead to really care.

Test-drive it in these new Races:
- ‘‘Under the Wing’‘
- ‘‘Need for Seed’‘
- ‘‘Drag Strip’‘

Hard top and convertible models both available to purchase now from Legendarymotorsport.net.
